text: The qualification group 2 for the 2010 European Men's Handball Championship includes the national teams of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Italy, Faroe Islands, Russia, Serbia and Switzerland. == Standings == == Fixtures and results == \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==References== * EHF Euro Events – Men's EURO 2010 (qualification) Qualification, Group 2
title: 2010 European Men's Handball Championship qualification – Group 2
